metadata.name: Post Metadata
metadata.description:
This is a GitCMS object schema to get a standard and complete metadata structure, used to customize even more your posts in the portfolio.
It's composed of: priority.

priority.label: Display Priority
priority.description:
The higher this value, the more important the post becomes, causing it to appear higher in its category list.
In the case of a tie in priority, posts with more recent publication dates are displayed first.
priority.placeholder: Enter priority, or leave empty for infinite priority...
